Park Events » Overview

Events in Franklin Park

The festival, held in Franklin Park from 9 am until 7 pm, is a day of fun, creativity, and safety for the whole family!

Highlights

* Active Life Exposition
* Family Fun Bike Ride
* Tricycle Parade
* Children's Bike Rodeo
* Entertainment and Food
* Demonstrations, workshops
* Moving Arts Program / Competition
